title: RIOT
body: this is the error massage please my friends are getting angry from me cuz they think i dodge too much

replies.body:
Interesting; so normally this kinda error hints at a connection issue. From the looks of things though your connection in Champ Select was ok to start with; everyone was banning and choosing ok, nothing froze it looks like until suddenly this came up.

It can still be a connection error but one more due to routing errors or packet loss. To start, I always suggest making sure your Connection is 100% solid by troubleshooting with [**these steps**](http://riot.com/12B7oac). Once you've confirmed it's at peak performance, you should also upload your network logs [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and check for packet loss that might be interrupting your game's communication. Keep in touch with me about the results if things go poorly and you have no packet loss; I'll look for other solutions. :)
English is not my first language lol but i will do my best thank you for responding

That's ok! In that case, I'd suggest writing in to Tech Support first; they should be able to provide the same or even better help and in your preferred language too. Go ahead and hit em up in a ticket [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Be sure to set the language to the one you want in the top right corner too. :)
thank you but there is no Arabic language in the list and i am trying the list that you gave me nothing worked for now

Hmm, try submitting a ticket using the English form, but still write in Arabic if you wish so EU Support can see what language you'd prefer. Either way they'll stick with you and support you to get this solved best they can. :)
thank you so much another thing i noticed today when i play Blind pick there is no error at all i think the Ban what makes the error
Be sure to let the Supporter in the ticket know next time you respond. It could be key information they'll use to identify a fix for you. ^^
ok thank you i will let you know if they didn't respond
